content.title: ELSA-2020-3869:  pcp security, bug fix, and enhancement update (LOW)
content.description:
[4.3.2-12]
- Fix pcp-atop dynamic memory initialization issues (BZ 1818710)

[4.3.2-8]
- Fix rpm %post privilege escalation CVEs (BZs 1815249, 1815528)
- Resolve an selinux policy issue with pmlogger (BZ 1792859)
